stf:test.name: pressure
stf:test.description: Test the ADC channel corresponding to the pressure gauge

inputParameter.description: Temperature gauge reading is used in pass criteria.
inputParameter.name: use_temperature

inputParameter.description: Number of ADC values to acquire to compute a mean and spread
inputParameter.name: loop_count

outputParameter.description: Mean of the 5volt ADC values in millivolts
outputParameter.name: adc_5v_mean_mvolts

outputParameter.description: Mean of the ADC values distribution in count units
outputParameter.name: adc_mean_counts

outputParameter.description: Spread of the ADC values distribution in count units
outputParameter.name: adc_rms_counts

outputParameter.description: Maximum of the ADC values distribution in count units
outputParameter.name: adc_max_counts

outputParameter.description: Minimum of the ADC values distribution in count units
outputParameter.name: adc_min_counts

outputParameter.description: Mean of the ADC values distribution in kPascal units
outputParameter.name: adc_mean_kpascal

outputParameter.description: Spread of the ADC values distribution in kPascal units
outputParameter.name: adc_rms_kpascal

outputParameter.description: Maximum of the ADC values distribution in kPascal units
outputParameter.name: adc_max_kpascal

outputParameter.description: Minimum of the ADC values distribution in kPascal units
outputParameter.name: adc_min_kpascal
